entry.title: scenes in a window
my little WebNeko wins again
entry.content: My finicky friend WebNeko (up there in the left corner) doesnâ€™t always play well with other scripts. At the b22 site, I actually had rebuilt the music section to bring little neko back. Now, here on the neo site, I did away with the Zonelets script, not because I didnâ€™t like it, but because I was able to bring my little buddy back. Yay!

entry.title: thanks!
entry.content:
In the short time since I joined Neocities, the feedback Iâ€™ve received from the community has been inspiring. To all of you following bulltown and those who have given me feedback, Iâ€™ve got something to say:

Thanks for making me feel welcome - I love this place!

entry.title: 7 Days and counting
entry.content:
ğ—¯ğ˜‚ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ˜ğ—¼ğ˜„ğ—».ğ—»ğ—²ğ—¼ is 7 days old today. Itâ€™s also my birthday but I stopped counting a long time ago. ğŸ˜

The original ğ—¯ğ˜‚ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ˜ğ—¼ğ˜„ğ—» goes back some 25 years and was revived in 2022. Versions 3 and 4 are still online, one of which evolved into my current simply. blog.

As the saying goes, this ainâ€™t my first rodeo. I love the web!

Thank you Neocities community - I appreciate those following ğ—¯ğ˜‚ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ˜ğ—¼ğ˜„ğ—».ğ—»ğ—²ğ—¼ and created a little section with your linked buttons on the main page (also at ğ—¯ğ˜‚ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ˜ğ—¼ğ˜„ğ—».ğŸ®ğŸ¬ğŸ®ğŸ®).

Make it a great day and thanks for stopping byâ€¦
